thread.title: Police Respond to Active Shooter at YouTube Headquarters South of San Francisco

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Police Respond to Active Shooter at YouTube Headquarters South of San Francisco

locations.name: san francisco bay san bruno youtube

text:
SAN BRUNO, Calif.—A woman armed with a handgun opened fire at YouTube headquarters on Tuesday, wounding three people before killing herself, police said.
San Bruno Police Chief Ed Barberini said the dead woman was believed to be the shooter in the incident, which occurred around 1 p.m. and sent employees rushing from YouTube’s main office building. Other employees hid in barricaded rooms as gunshots rang out.

The... RELATED VIDEO YouTube Shooter's Video Complaining of Unfair Treatment Nasim Najafi Aghdam, accused of shooting three people inside YouTube's headquarters in San Bruno, Calif., posted this video to her personal website in January, complaining of unfair treatment by the company.
